mapper.select: select b.no, b.user_no as userNo, u.name, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth from rboard b inner join users u on b.user_no = u.no order by b.no

select b.no, b.user_no as userNo, u.name, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth from rboard b inner join users u on b.user_no = u.no where b.no = #{no} order by b.no
mapper.insert: insert into rboard (user_no, title, content, reg_date, group_no, order_no, depth) values (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{no}, 1, 0)
